description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8v72o","text":"A standard cell-based assay to assess the function of murine CAR T cells, which we regularly perform at the end of the process of generating CAR T cells (see \"Retroviral transduction of primary murine CD8 T cells\").","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fo3cq","text":"For each adherent tumor cell line, plate 5x105 cells / 3mL (previously growing in log phase) in one 6-well-plate well; Incubate cells for ~3hr to rest.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":45,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ckn6l","text":"In the Hot Lab, label the target cells with 50 μL 51Cr (vial \u003c1wk old), 100μL (1-2wk old), or 150μL (\u003e2wk old). Place in Hot Lab incubator overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14},{"style":"sup","offset":50,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"s8al","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2ntf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b2cqu","text":"Overnight chromium incorporation is often sufficient, but the duration may vary depending on the cell line. If the positive control (soap-killed cells) endpoint values are inadequate, the length of time can be adjusted.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6cfh7","text":"From each transduced T cell  culture, remove 9x105 cells, wash with fresh mouse T cell media (mTCM) for 6min at 400rcf, and resuspend in 3mL mTCM.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":49,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"111vt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fq36n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bmbrs","text":"mTCM is prepared by combining the following:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ceeqj","text":"1000 mL          RPMI1640 (with 25mM HEPES)","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8lc3c","text":"100 mL            FBS (heat inactivated)","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"136p4","text":"10 mL              Sodium pyruvate (1mM)","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"abot9","text":"1 mL                HEPES (1M)","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7d846","text":"10 mL              Pen/Strep","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5kpan","text":"100 mL             b-mercaptoethanol 0.5M","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":18,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"7dlsg","text":"Filter with 0.22mm","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"939s9","text":"Begin processing the target cells. To remove extracellular 51Cr, briefly wash the adherent lines with 5mL Cell Dissociation Buffer (0.5mM EDTA in PBS). Repeat the wash. Dispose the 51Cr-containing media appropriately.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jekc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bi9ra","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7t0q3","text":"Non-enzymatic dissociation is a critical step for preserving cell-surface antigen. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e0n09","text":"In triplicates, transfer 150μL (4.5x104 effector cells) to U-bottom 96-well-plate wells (in columns 1, 2, 3). Pipet mTCM (100uL/wel) into the remainder of the row (4-12); prepare 3 serial dilutions (1:3) by pipetting 50uL to the respective 100uL volumes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":38,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7j5f1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"91elo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7taep","text":"This would assess cell killing for one CAR T cell culture against one target. Scale up as needed by seeding additional rows.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3vakt","text":"Count the cells using a hemocytometer. Adjust volume to 1E4 cells / mL mTCM.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":56,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3od94","text":"Transfer 100μL (1E3 target cells) to each well on the respective half of the plate already containing 100uL of effector CAR-T cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3i947","text":"To dissociate target cells, add 3mL Cell Dissociation Buffer to each well, incubate at 37C for 10-15 mins. Add 3mL mTCM; centrifuge at 400rcf for 4min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6bdt4","text":"Finally, transfer 100μL target cells to an extra row. Add 100μL of soap (NP40+Trypan blue) to generate a positive control. Add 100μL mTCM to generate a negative control.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"35bq1","text":"Centrifuge plate at 800rpm for 3mins; incubate at 37C for 24 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"90edu","text":"Harvest 30uL supernatant from each plate; carefully transfer onto respective Luma plate wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f692t","text":"Dry the plate completely for ~24 hours. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"68geg","text":"Acquire data on the plate scintillation counter per respective protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: 51Cr Release Cytotoxicity Assay for murine CAR T cells
title_html: 51Cr Release Cytotoxicity Assay for murine CAR T cells
